resources.name: Open Science Framework
resources.description: Open-access repository for research data, protocols, and materials across sports science. Supports storing and sharing physiological, performance, and psychological datasets from intervention studies in cycling, football, volleyball, athletics, and esports research.

resources.name: Baseball-Reference.com
resources.description: Comprehensive historical baseball statistics database containing career records, season statistics, and detailed play-by-play data for MLB players and teams. Essential resource for sabermetrics, performance analysis, and historical baseball research.

resources.name: ESPN Sports Data
resources.description: Aggregated sports statistics and scores across basketball, baseball, and american football from ESPN's official coverage. Provides team and player statistics, game results, and performance metrics for NBA, MLB, and NFL analysis.

resources.name: IAAF World Records Database
resources.description: Official World Athletics (formerly IAAF) database of world records and performance standards across track and field events. Provides historical records, progression data, and competition results for athletics analysis and pacing research.

resources.name: FIBA Box Score Database
resources.description: Official FIBA basketball statistics including game box scores, player performance data, and continental championship records. Supports comparative analysis of regional playing styles and team performance strategies.

resources.name: StatsBomb Event Data
resources.description: Granular football event-level data including passes, shots, defensive actions, and player positioning. Enables advanced analytics like expected goals (xG) and decision-making evaluation in soccer.

resources.name: FIBA Official Archives
resources.description: FIBA's official archive of basketball championship records, rules changes, and historical competition data. Supports research on game evolution, rule impacts, and performance trends across continental competitions.

resources.name: FIFA Match Centre
resources.description: Official FIFA database providing football match results, player statistics, team formations, and detailed match reports from international tournaments. Supports performance analysis, injury tracking, and competitive strategy research.

resources.name: Hawkin Dynamics Cloud
resources.description: Cloud-based force plate data warehousing system capturing lower-body neuromuscular performance metrics (jump, sprint, strength tests). Provides normative reference data and objective benchmarks for athlete assessment across sports.

resources.name: NHL.com Official Statistics
resources.description: National Hockey League's official database of game statistics, player records, team performance, and scouting data. Supports ice hockey analytics research on team performance, coaching impact, and player development.

resources.name: Statista Sports Database
resources.description: Commercial statistical database providing aggregated sports data, attendance figures, revenue information, and demographic analysis. Supports economics and marketing research in professional basketball and sports business.

resources.name: Axivity AX6 Inertial Sensor
resources.description: Wearable inertial measurement unit capturing acceleration, gyroscope, and magnetometer data for movement analysis. Used for activity detection, running mechanics assessment, and athlete movement classification in athletics.

resources.name: Baidu Map Geospatial Data
resources.description: Chinese geospatial and mapping platform providing location data for sports events and outdoor activity venues. Enables analysis of marathon distribution, jogging patterns, and environmental factors affecting athletic participation.

resources.name: Candis R Package
resources.description: R statistical package implementing canonical discriminant analysis for basketball game statistics. Enables identification of performance variables that differentiate between regional basketball championships and competition levels.

resources.name: CLRS Algorithmic Reasoning Benchmark
resources.description: DeepMind's algorithmic reasoning benchmark library providing neural network models for complex reasoning tasks. Applied to football tactics analysis and strategic decision-making in soccer.

resources.name: Euroleague.net
resources.description: Official Euroleague Basketball API and website providing comprehensive play-by-play game data, match statistics, and season information for European professional basketball competitions. Essential for analyzing team performance, game dynamics, and competitive trends in top-tier European basketball.

resources.name: Experimental Motion Capture Data
resources.description: Motion capture dataset containing kinematic measurements for cycling and golf biomechanics research. Enables detailed technical analysis of athlete movement patterns, swing mechanics, and performance optimization in both sports.

resources.name: FEB (Federación Española de Baloncesto)
resources.description: Spanish Basketball Federation official statistics repository providing comprehensive match data, player statistics, and game performance metrics for Spanish professional basketball leagues. Key resource for analyzing Spanish basketball competition structure and player/team performance.

resources.name: FIBA Statistics Collection System
resources.description: International Basketball Federation's standardized statistical collection system used in major tournaments like EuroBasket. Provides consistent game-related statistical elements (shooting, rebounds, turnovers) for analyzing competition outcomes and team performance.

resources.name: FIFA Training Centre - Match Report Hub
resources.description: Official FIFA women's football match analysis reports providing detailed performance data including offensive indicators, running metrics, and phase-specific performance analytics for international tournaments.

resources.name: Garmin Enduro
resources.description: Wearable sports watch with advanced power measurement and performance monitoring capabilities for cycling. Enables collection of power data, training load, and physiological metrics for analyzing cycling performance and workout effectiveness.

resources.name: Hungarian Basketball Federation Repository
resources.description: Official Hungarian Basketball Federation database containing game statistics, player performance data, and match results from Hungarian professional basketball leagues. Supports analysis of offensive efficiency, positional roles, and team success metrics.

resources.name: InStat Scout
resources.description: Professional sports analytics platform providing detailed event-level data, player statistics, and performance metrics for basketball and football. Enables advanced performance analysis, tactical insights, and competitive benchmarking across leagues.

resources.name: Lahman Baseball Database
resources.description: Comprehensive historical baseball statistics database covering player records, seasonal performance, and game outcomes. Standard resource for baseball analytics research including batting, pitching, and fielding historical analysis.

resources.name: Liga ASOBAL Official Website
resources.description: Spanish Handball League official statistics repository providing match data, player statistics, and game performance metrics. Primary data source for analyzing Spanish professional handball competition and player development patterns.

resources.name: NCAA Coaches Panel Ranking
resources.description: Official NCAA ranking system providing expert-curated competitive rankings for collegiate sports. Used as a standard instrument for evaluating team strength, predicting tournament outcomes, and assessing competitive performance across divisions.

resources.name: NFL Play-by-Play Data
resources.description: Official National Football League play-by-play game data from NFL.com containing detailed event-level information for every game. Essential for analyzing game outcomes, turnovers, player performance, and injury patterns in American football.

resources.name: Romanian Athletic Federation Archive
resources.description: Romanian Athletics Federation historical performance database containing competition results and athlete records. Supports research on individual athletic performance evolution, national talent development, and event-specific performance trends.

resources.name: Strava
resources.description: Crowd-sourced fitness tracking platform capturing real-world cycling performance data including routes, power output, and time metrics from millions of recreational and professional cyclists. Enables analysis of training patterns and competitive cycling performance.

resources.name: Supplementary Material Dataset
resources.description: Research dataset containing performance and demographic data for ice hockey and basketball, including relative age effects in ice hockey coaching and team resilience metrics. Supports analysis of competitive structure and team performance dynamics.

resources.name: Vicon Nexus
resources.description: Motion capture and biomechanics analysis software that uses optical tracking systems to measure athlete movement patterns, kinematics, and force data. Widely used for analyzing running mechanics and skating performance in research contexts.

resources.name: WhoScored
resources.description: Comprehensive football event and performance dataset containing detailed match statistics, player ratings, and action-level data from major European leagues. Enables analysis of playing patterns, team tactics, and individual player performance metrics.

resources.name: 2013 Chevron Houston Marathon Results
resources.description: Marathon race results dataset containing individual participant times, splits, and demographic information. Useful for studying pacing strategies, performance variation, and comparative analysis across runner populations.

resources.name: 2018-2019 High School Athletics Participation Survey
resources.description: National survey of high school sports participation across the United States, tracking participation numbers by sport and demographics. Provides aggregate data for studying sports participation trends and gender distribution in youth athletics.

resources.name: 2024 TCS London Marathon Results
resources.description: Official race results and timing data from the London Marathon including individual split times and finishing information. Enables longitudinal and cross-sectional analysis of marathon performance, pacing patterns, and endurance running metrics.

resources.name: 247Sports Recruiting Class Ratings
resources.description: Comprehensive database of college football recruit evaluations and composite recruiting rankings. Provides player ratings, team recruiting class rankings, and recruitment outcomes for analyzing talent acquisition and player development trajectories.

resources.name: BNK FearX Academy Curriculum
resources.description: Educational materials and curriculum documentation from a League of Legends esports academy. Provides insight into professional esports training methodologies, coaching structures, and player development programs in competitive gaming.

resources.name: Dplus Esports Academy Curriculum
resources.description: Training curriculum and educational materials from a professional League of Legends esports academy. Documents coaching approaches and skill development frameworks used in elite esports player preparation.

resources.name: DRX Esports Academy Curriculum
resources.description: Educational and training materials from a top-tier League of Legends esports organization. Contains information on academy structure, player development pathways, and competitive training methodology in professional esports.

resources.name: GameCoach Academy Curriculum
resources.description: Esports academy curriculum and training documentation focused on League of Legends player development. Provides data on coaching systems and progression frameworks in professional esports training environments.

resources.name: Gen.G Global Academy Curriculum
resources.description: Training and curriculum materials from a major esports organization's academy program for League of Legends. Documents professional player development approaches and competitive training standards in elite esports.

resources.name: Seoul Game Academy Curriculum
resources.description: Educational materials from a Korean esports academy focused on League of Legends training and player development. Provides insight into coaching methodologies and career trajectory frameworks in professional esports.

resources.name: T1 Academy Curriculum
resources.description: Training materials and curriculum from T1's official esports academy for League of Legends. Documents the development systems and methodologies used by one of the most successful professional esports organizations.

resources.name: Dribbling Determinants Analysis
resources.description: GitHub repository containing code and analysis for identifying factors that determine successful one-on-one dribbling in football. Includes data processing scripts for analyzing dribble mechanics and contextual variables affecting dribble success.

resources.name: AAGPBL Official Records
resources.description: Complete historical database of All-American Girls Professional Baseball League seasons, statistics, and records. Provides comprehensive data for studying professional women's baseball performance, career trajectories, and league dynamics.

resources.name: Alliance of European Hockey Clubs
resources.description: Database of European ice hockey club information and competition data, providing historical records and statistics for analyzing men's ice hockey championships and performance dynamics across European leagues.

resources.name: allsport-tv.com video database
resources.description: Video archive and database of basketball matches and competitions, enabling analysis of game footage for tactical studies, competition structure analysis, and performance evaluation in basketball.

resources.name: alltime-athletics.com
resources.description: Comprehensive athletics performance records database containing historical track and field results and rankings, used for analyzing performance trends, doping effects, and long-term athlete development patterns.

resources.name: footstats
resources.description: GitHub repository for football statistics and predictive analytics, implementing expected goals (xG) algorithms and analytical frameworks for evaluating team and player performance in football.

resources.name: AMTI force platforms
resources.description: Laboratory instrument for measuring ground reaction forces and biomechanical data during athletic movements, essential for analyzing running mechanics, impact loading, and footwear effects in athletics.

resources.name: Ansys Fluent
resources.description: Computational fluid dynamics software used for aerodynamic analysis and optimization of cycling equipment, enabling simulation-based design improvements for helmets and other cycling gear.

resources.name: ANT+ protocol
resources.description: Wireless communication protocol for sports sensors and wearable devices in cycling, enabling real-time data collection from training equipment for personalized highlight generation and performance analysis.

resources.name: Antidoping.cz database
resources.description: Czech Anti-Doping Commission database containing doping control records and test results, providing data for analyzing anti-doping policy effectiveness and performance trends in athletics.

resources.name: Arduino Pro Mini
resources.description: Microcontroller platform for building custom wearable sensor systems and real-time biomechanical feedback devices, used in athletics for training applications like hammer throw technique monitoring.

resources.name: ASC Dukla Praha athletic history
resources.description: Historical records of Czechoslovak Army Sports Club athletic performances and development, providing longitudinal data for analyzing running performance evolution and training effects over decades.

resources.name: soccer-fatigue-model
resources.description: GitHub repository implementing biophysical muscle fatigue models for dynamic soccer contexts, enabling analysis of player fatigue effects on performance and tactical decision-making during matches.

resources.name: Athlete Game Lost
resources.description: Database documenting Major League Baseball player injuries and games missed, enabling analysis of injury impacts on career trajectories and team performance in baseball.

resources.name: athlete_report_generator
resources.description: GitHub repository for generating interpretable machine learning-based athlete profiles from multi-domain field assessment data in football, enabling motor profiling and performance prediction.

resources.name: Baseball Reference
resources.description: Comprehensive baseball statistics database with historical records of players, teams, and seasons, widely used for analyzing performance trends, player transactions, and network analysis in baseball.

resources.name: Baseballprojection.com
resources.description: Baseball statistics and projection database including defensive efficiency rating (DER) data, used for analyzing fielding performance and evaluating defensive metrics across baseball eras.

resources.name: Basketball Insiders
resources.description: A basketball news and statistics website providing NBA team performance data, salary information, and analysis resources. Used as a source for NBA regular season statistical analysis and team performance metrics.

resources.name: Basketball-Reference.com
resources.description: Comprehensive basketball statistics database offering detailed NBA player, team, and season-level performance data. A primary resource for basketball analytics research and historical performance analysis.

resources.name: Basketnews.lt
resources.description: Lithuanian basketball news and statistics portal providing game results, team statistics, and match data for European basketball analysis, including home court advantage studies.

resources.name: Bayesian Optimization
resources.description: Python library implementing Bayesian optimization algorithms for hyperparameter tuning and parameter search. Applicable to sports analytics model optimization across various sports.

resources.name: The Prediction Tracker NCAA Archive
resources.description: Historical database of NCAA college football predictions and outcomes. Provides prediction records and actual results for validating predictive models in college football.

resources.name: BetExplorer
resources.description: Betting odds and sports results aggregation platform providing historical match data, odds, and outcomes across multiple sports. Used for analyzing betting markets and team performance correlation.

resources.name: BigDataBall
resources.description: Basketball analytics platform offering detailed play-by-play data, player tracking information, and advanced statistics for NBA and college basketball research.

resources.name: Biosen C-line Blood Lactate Analyzer
resources.description: Laboratory instrument for measuring blood lactate concentration during exercise testing. Used in physiology research to assess aerobic capacity and training response in running and athletics.

resources.name: Body Rocket On-Bike Sensor System
resources.description: Wearable sensor system with four load cell force sensors for measuring cycling dynamics and aerodynamic drag during performance testing. Provides real-time biomechanical feedback during on-bike assessment.

resources.name: Borussia Dortmund Financial Reports
resources.description: Annual and semi-annual financial statements from a major German football club (BVB). Provides player valuation and asset accounting data for analyzing footballer value in club financial records.

resources.name: Boston Athletic Association Qualifying Standards
resources.description: Official Boston Marathon qualification time standards by age and gender. Dataset documenting eligibility criteria used to analyze gender-based performance effects on marathon participation.

resources.name: Novo Basquete Brasil (NBB)
resources.description: Official website of the Brazilian National Basketball League providing league statistics, team records, and game results. Also includes judo competition data from the Brazilian sports federation.

resources.name: Brooks Baseball
resources.description: Detailed baseball pitch-by-pitch database with pitch classification, velocity, and movement data collected from PITCHf/x systems. Primary resource for analyzing pitching mechanics and performance in MLB.

resources.name: Brooks Ghost 6 Running Shoe
resources.description: Cushioned running shoe used as a test instrument in biomechanics research. Enables controlled studies of shoe properties on impact loading, leg stiffness, and running mechanics.

resources.name: NFL Play Classification GNN
resources.description: GitHub repository implementing Graph Neural Networks for classifying NFL plays using player tracking data. Enables automated play-type detection and pattern recognition from tracking coordinates.

resources.name: CAESAR Project Anthropometric Database
resources.description: Comprehensive anthropometric measurement database containing detailed body dimension data used for equipment design and optimization. Essential for cycling aerodynamics research, helmet design, and biomechanical modeling to improve athletic performance and safety.

resources.name: Cap Friendly
resources.description: Ice hockey salary cap and contract database providing detailed information on player compensation, contract terms, and team payroll data. Enables analysis of coaching staff compensation, contract structures, and their relationships to team performance in professional ice hockey.

resources.name: Cardiolab +
resources.description: Specialized cardiovascular and physiological monitoring software for measuring athletic performance metrics. Used in gymnastics and team sport contexts to assess physiological responses, training load, and aerobic capacity during competition and training.

resources.name: CDC U.S. Birth Data
resources.description: U.S. Centers for Disease Control national birth registry and demographic statistics. Provides population-level birth date data essential for analyzing relative age effects and demographic patterns in youth and professional sports populations.

resources.name: CBS Israeli Birth Data
resources.description: Central Bureau of Statistics Israel national birth registry and demographic data. Provides Israeli population birth records needed to analyze relative age effects and age-related patterns in female basketball and other sports.

resources.name: Champion Data Chinese Super League Database
resources.description: Player statistics and performance metrics database for Chinese Super League football. Contains comprehensive player stats enabling exploratory analysis, player evaluation models, and statistical profiling of soccer performance across multiple dimensions.

resources.name: Lactate Pro 2
resources.description: Portable lactate analyzer instrument measuring blood lactate levels during exercise. Used in football and gymnastics to assess metabolic responses, training intensity, aerobic fitness, and physiological demands during competition and training protocols.

resources.name: China Marathon Website
resources.description: Comprehensive database of marathon race results, event information, and participation data across China. Covers athletics marathon events and related national sports data, enabling temporal and spatial analysis of running events and athletic performance trends.

resources.name: Chinese Taipei Baseball Association
resources.description: Official baseball association website providing tournament results, team rankings, and game data for Taiwanese high school and competitive baseball. Supplies match results and tournament structure data for baseball analytics and tournament ranking analysis.

resources.name: ChirpStack LoRaWAN Network Server
resources.description: Open-source Long Range Wide Area Network (LoRaWAN) server platform for deploying IoT tracking systems. Enables real-time athlete positioning and performance monitoring at large-scale events like marathons through distributed wireless sensor networks.

resources.name: CIES Football Observatory InStat Index
resources.description: Football performance analytics platform providing event-level data, player valuations, and match statistics. Supplies detailed event data and performance metrics enabling advanced analysis of defensive actions, player impact, and match dynamics in soccer.

resources.name: Cleaning the Glass
resources.description: Advanced basketball analytics website providing lineup data, four-factors statistics, and team composition metrics. Enables analysis of lineup usage patterns, lineup effectiveness, and topological properties of NBA team rotations and player combinations.

resources.name: Coaches Database
resources.description: Comprehensive database of college football coaching staff, contact information, and career history. Provides detailed coaching staff data enabling research on coaching recruitment, career trajectories, and the impact of coaching decisions on recruiting outcomes.

resources.name: College Sport Racial and Gender Report Cards
resources.description: Demographic and diversity analysis database tracking racial and gender representation in college sports leadership and coaching. Provides institutional-level data on head coaches and assistant coaches enabling analysis of diversity and equity in college football.

resources.name: Smartphone Inertial Sensors ML for Athletics
resources.description: GitHub repository containing machine learning code for estimating athletic power variables using smartphone accelerometer and gyroscope sensors. Enables real-time power estimation and sprint/jumping performance analysis in athletics using accessible mobile device technology.

resources.name: Corsica Hockey
resources.description: A comprehensive ice hockey analytics platform providing NHL player and team statistics, advanced metrics, and historical data for performance analysis and research.

resources.name: Cot's Baseball Contracts
resources.description: A detailed database of Major League Baseball player contracts and compensation data, enabling research on player wages, contract structures, and labor economics in professional baseball.

resources.name: CPI Inflation Data
resources.description: Consumer Price Index historical data from the Federal Reserve, used to adjust and normalize monetary values in sports economics research across different time periods.

resources.name: Cricbuzz
resources.description: A cricket statistics and match information platform providing detailed play-by-play data, player performance metrics, and coverage of franchise leagues like the IPL for analytical research.

resources.name: Dota 2 Match Outcomes
resources.description: A GitHub repository containing Dota 2 esports match data and in-game chat logs with associated outcome labels, enabling machine learning models for real-time match outcome prediction.

resources.name: CTBC Black Panther Cup Database
resources.description: Official match statistics and tournament results from Taiwan's high school baseball championship, providing tournament structure data for ranking and network analysis research.

resources.name: Cycling Safety Survey Tool
resources.description: A web-based survey application built on Shiny for collecting spatial and demographic data on cycling safety perceptions, enabling quantitative analysis of cyclist concerns and infrastructure needs.

resources.name: SKS-Transformer Activity Recognition
resources.description: A GitHub repository containing a deep learning model (SKS-Transformer) for recognizing golf swing activities from inertial sensor data with multi-scale attention mechanisms.

resources.name: Cyclists' Workouts and Race Dataset
resources.description: A dataset containing professional cyclists' training workouts and race performance data, enabling optimization research for team cyclist assignment and race preparation planning.

resources.name: Czech Figure Skating Results Database
resources.description: A competitive results database from the Czech Figure Skating Association's youth training program, providing performance data to analyze physical determinants of competitive success.

resources.name: Czech Ministry Sport Financing Data
resources.description: Government sports funding and support data from the Czech Ministry of Education, Youth and Sports, used to contextualize athlete performance trends in relation to resource allocation.

resources.name: Dartfish Connect
resources.description: A video analysis platform providing access to athletics competition footage and biomechanical data, enabling retrospective analysis of technique evolution in track and field events.

resources.name: WebPlotDigitizer
resources.description: A data extraction tool that converts graphical data from images and PDFs into numerical datasets, enabling digitization of historical soccer biomechanical research for fatigue modeling.

resources.name: Wrestling Observer Newsletter
resources.description: A professional wrestling and MMA industry publication providing pay-per-view buy data and business metrics, enabling analysis of celebrity fighter economic value and market impact.

resources.name: DBL Indonesia Basketball Statistics
resources.description: Official match statistics database from Indonesia's premier basketball league (DBL), providing player performance data for predictive modeling of young athlete prospects and talent evaluation.

resources.name: Deneyap Development Board (240 MHz Dual Core)
resources.description: A microprocessor-based development board used for wearable sensor systems in basketball. Enables real-time inertial measurement unit (IMU) data collection through a motion-tracking vest for action recognition and performance analysis.

resources.name: DFB Membership Data
resources.description: Official German Football Association (Deutscher Fußball-Bund) membership statistics and records. Provides comprehensive data on player registration, participation, and demographic information across German football leagues and youth programs.

resources.name: Digital Elevation Model (DEM) - GSCloud
resources.description: Geospatial elevation data sourced from GSCloud that characterizes terrain features. Useful for analyzing how environmental factors like topography influence outdoor running activity patterns and route selection.

resources.name: NASA SRTM3 Digital Elevation Model
resources.description: Global satellite-derived elevation data from NASA's Shuttle Radar Topography Mission. Used to analyze how altitude and terrain characteristics affect pacing strategies and physiological load in mountain running events.

resources.name: Digital Terrain Model of Poland
resources.description: High-resolution terrain elevation data for Poland from the national geodetic database. Enables analysis of GPS accuracy challenges and elevation measurement errors in mountain and trail running contexts.

resources.name: DINED Anthropometric Database
resources.description: Comprehensive anthropometric measurements and human body dimension data from TU Delft. Used for creating digital mannequins and optimizing equipment design, including cyclist helmet aerodynamic simulations.

resources.name: Dokter Entropy Rating System
resources.description: Advanced statistical rating and prediction instrument for college football teams. Provides entropy-based metrics for evaluating team strength and generating probabilistic game outcome predictions.

resources.name: DP World Tour Strokes Gained Statistics
resources.description: Official European professional golf tour (DP World Tour) performance statistics including strokes gained metrics by category. Provides detailed shot-by-shot analysis data for elite male golfers across tournaments.

resources.name: Dutch National Sprint Triathlon Championships
resources.description: Official race results and timing data from Dutch national-level sprint triathlon competitions. Contains participant performance metrics across swim, bike, and run disciplines for triathlon talent assessment.

resources.name: DUV Race Database
resources.description: German Ultra Marathon Association (Deutscher Ultramarathon Verband) comprehensive race results and ultramarathon performance data. Tracks thousands of ultramarathon events and finisher records for performance analysis.

resources.name: DUV Ultra Marathon Statistics
resources.description: Distance records and performance database from the German Ultra Marathon Association. Contains historical ultramarathon race data and finishing times used for trend analysis and athlete performance prediction.

resources.name: Education Commission of the States
resources.description: Educational institution database and statistics covering U.S. schools and colleges. Used as reference data for demographic and age analysis studies of athletes in basketball leagues.

resources.name: where-do-the-robot-umpires-see
resources.description: GitHub repository analyzing automated ball-strike detection systems in professional baseball. Contains code and analysis examining the spatial accuracy and decision patterns of automated umpire systems.

resources.name: Elite Long Jumpers with Below-Knee Prostheses
resources.description: Biomechanical analysis dataset and code for Paralympic elite long jumpers with prosthetic limbs. Enables comparative study of jumping technique, approach velocity, and take-off mechanics in adapted athletics.

resources.name: engsoccerdata
resources.description: GitHub repository containing historical English football match results, scores, and league standings data. Comprehensive dataset enabling time-series analysis and machine learning applications for soccer prediction.

resources.name: EPV (Expected Possession Value)
resources.description: GitHub repository containing Expected Possession Value calculations and tutorials for football match analysis. Provides code and methods for valuing possessions in soccer using tracking data, enabling quantitative assessment of player actions and team strategies.

resources.name: ESPN NBA Database
resources.description: Comprehensive online database of NBA player statistics, team records, game results, and performance metrics. Provides historical and current season data for basketball research, player performance analysis, and injury/return-to-play tracking.

resources.name: Esports Earnings
resources.description: Database tracking tournament prize money, career earnings, and competitive performance data for esports players across multiple games. Enables analysis of esports career trajectories, earnings patterns, and player longevity in competitive gaming.

resources.name: EuroBasket
resources.description: Official website and database for European basketball championships with tournament results, player statistics, and team performance data. Provides match-level and player-level analytics for European professional basketball research.

resources.name: European Athletics
resources.description: Official database and information portal for European track and field competitions, athlete records, and competition results. Contains anthropometric data, performance metrics, and results for elite athletics analysis.

resources.name: European Athletics Association (EAA)
resources.description: Organizational database for European athletics featuring competition statistics, athlete records, and performance data across track and field events. Supports analysis of competition strategies and athlete performance in jumping events.

resources.name: European Athletics athletes database
resources.description: Athlete-focused database providing personal records, competition histories, and performance metrics for European track and field competitors. Enables statistical analysis of individual and event-level performance in jumping disciplines.

resources.name: European Basketball Championship 2011 (U-18)
resources.description: Tournament database for the 2011 FIBA Europe Under-18 Women's Basketball Championship containing game statistics, player performance data, and match results. Provides youth basketball performance metrics for positional and shooting analysis.

resources.name: European Handball Federation statistics
resources.description: Official statistics repository for European handball competitions including match results, player performance data, and technical metrics. Supports analysis of tactical preparation and technical skill evaluation in junior handball.

resources.name: Expected Threat (xT)
resources.description: Football analytics metric and methodology that measures the threat (goal-scoring potential) created by player actions on the ball. A defensive valuation instrument that quantifies the effectiveness of tackles, interceptions, and defensive positioning in soccer.

resources.name: Expert ratings data (Soccer Digest Web J1 Rating)
resources.description: Japanese football database containing expert subjective player ratings and performance assessments for J1 League matches. Provides expert-curated valuation data complementing event-based metrics for soccer player analysis.

resources.name: Federal Reserve Economic Data (FRED)
resources.description: Macroeconomic time series database maintained by the Federal Reserve with economic indicators and data. Provides contextual economic variables for predicting NFL stadium attendance patterns and fan behavior.

resources.name: FIBA LiveStats
resources.description: Real-time and historical basketball statistics platform for international competitions including player and team performance metrics. Enables analysis of player performance across different competitive contexts and leagues.

resources.name: FIFA Index
resources.description: Database of FIFA video game player ratings and attributes used as proxy data for real-world football player performance. Provides machine-readable player characteristic data for building predictive models of match outcomes.

resources.name: FIG Code of Points 2013-2016
resources.description: Official International Gymnastics Federation scoring rules and point allocation system for aerobic gymnastics competitions. Establishes the scoring framework and difficulty valuations necessary for analyzing elite aerobic gymnastics performance and judging.

resources.name: Fitlight Technology System
resources.description: A reactive agility training system that uses LED targets to measure and improve cognitive-motor response in athletes. Used in basketball research to assess the effectiveness of exercise programs incorporating visual-reactive training stimulus.

resources.name: Flashscore.com
resources.description: Live score tracking and sports data platform providing match results, statistics, and historical data. Serves as a data source for basketball analytics studies analyzing home-court advantage and win percentage trends across leagues.

resources.name: Handball Match Analysis Repository
resources.description: GitHub repository containing code and analysis tools for handball match prediction using machine learning and Bayesian statistical methods. Enables automated feature extraction and team strength estimation for match outcome forecasting.

resources.name: Foot Locker Cross-Country Championships 2018 Results
resources.description: Historical race results dataset from the 2018 Foot Locker Cross-Country Championships. Provides performance data for analyzing elite distance running performance and competitive differences across athletes in track and field athletics.

resources.name: Football Database
resources.description: Comprehensive soccer match database containing historical results, team statistics, and player information. Supports machine learning applications for match outcome prediction and performance analysis in football.

resources.name: ForceDecks Max Force Plate System
resources.description: Advanced force measurement instrument for capturing ground reaction forces during athletic movements like vertical jump testing. Used in basketball research to analyze countermovement jump biomechanics and compare athlete force-time profiles.

resources.name: FTC Ferencváros Annual Financial Reports
resources.description: Official financial and operational documentation from a major European football club covering multiple seasons. Primary data source for analyzing player asset valuations and financial reporting practices in professional football organizations.

resources.name: Functional Movement Screen (FMS) Kit
resources.description: Standardized movement assessment tool measuring functional mobility and stability through seven bodyweight exercises. Used in football athlete profiling to evaluate motor control and identify injury risk factors using machine learning interpretation.

resources.name: Gallup Survey Data on Sports Preferences
resources.description: National survey data tracking American sports viewership and fan preferences across decades. Provides demographic context for studying historical trends and disparities in baseball, including racial representation in professional sports.

resources.name: gbm: Generalized Boosted Regression Models
resources.description: R package implementing gradient boosting machine learning algorithms for predictive modeling. Applied in American football research for forecasting turnover probability based on game situation variables.

resources.name: German Athletics Association Database
resources.description: Official database and records from the German Athletics Association (Deutscher Leichtathletik-Verband) tracking junior and senior track and field performance. Source for evaluating talent identification systems and youth athlete development in athletics.

resources.name: Basketball ML Performance Forecasting Repository
resources.description: GitHub repository containing implementations and datasets for evaluating machine learning models in basketball performance prediction. Enables comparative analysis of different algorithms for forecasting player and team metrics.

resources.name: Association Rules Mining Dataset
resources.description: GitHub dataset repository for applying association rule mining algorithms to basketball analytics. Supports discovery of patterns in recovery behaviors and economic impacts from game scheduling and player availability.

resources.name: Skeletal Pose to Activity Classifier
resources.description: GitHub code repository implementing neural network models for classifying basketball player activities from skeletal pose estimation data. Enables analysis of pose input variations and their impact on activity recognition accuracy.

resources.name: GMM Basketball Shot Charts
resources.description: R package implementing Gaussian Mixture Model approach for spatial estimation and visualization of basketball shot charts. Enables model-based analysis of shooting patterns and court location effectiveness in basketball.

resources.name: GMTSAR Dataset
resources.description: A radar image processing dataset used for spatial analysis and computer vision applications in sports contexts. This resource provides synthetic aperture radar (SAR) imagery that can be applied to tracking and monitoring in basketball game environments.

resources.name: Google Drive
resources.description: Cloud storage and data sharing platform used by sports researchers to host and distribute datasets, including NBA playoff statistics, Olympic athletics records, American football broadcast transcripts, and youth football competition data across multiple sports.

resources.name: Google Pixel Watch 2
resources.description: A smartwatch device with integrated sensors (heart rate, GPS, accelerometer) for real-time biometric tracking and performance monitoring in endurance sports like marathon running and long-distance athletics.

resources.name: GPT-4o
resources.description: A large language model API from OpenAI capable of processing and summarizing complex structured data. Used in esports analytics to automatically generate insights from League of Legends match data and game statistics.

resources.name: Grid WAR Metric
resources.description: An advanced baseball analytics metric that reimagines Wins Above Replacement (WAR) specifically for starting pitchers. Provides more granular performance evaluation by accounting for context-dependent pitcher contributions.

resources.name: Hack-a-Stat
resources.description: A basketball statistics database providing detailed EuroLeague performance data including player and team metrics. Enables advanced statistical analysis of basketball lineups and their efficiency across European professional competition.

resources.name: Lafayette Hand-Held Dynamometer
resources.description: A portable measurement instrument for quantifying muscular strength and force production in football players. Used in field assessments to profile athlete motor capabilities and inform training and injury prevention strategies.

resources.name: handball-base.com
resources.description: A comprehensive handball statistics database containing match results, player performance metrics, and team data. Supports machine learning applications for match prediction and statistical team strength estimation in handball.

resources.name: Hashtag Basketball NBA Injury Database
resources.description: A specialized NBA injury database tracking player injuries, surgery details, and return-to-play timelines. Enables research on rehabilitation outcomes and performance recovery patterns following operative treatments in professional basketball.

resources.description: An Icelandic handball statistics platform providing detailed match and player performance data. Enables analysis of tactical shot selection strategies and decision-making patterns in professional handball competition.

resources.description: A health data aggregation platform providing access to Fitbit wearable sensor data (heart rate, step count, sleep) for longitudinal athlete monitoring. Enables biomechanical and epidemiological studies of running injuries like Achilles tendinopathy.

resources.name: Hockey Stat Cards
resources.description: An ice hockey statistics database providing detailed player and team performance metrics. Supports longitudinal analysis of psychological states and their relationships with athletic performance in professional hockey.

resources.name: Hoka Conquest Running Shoe
resources.description: A highly cushioned running shoe used as a test instrument in biomechanical studies. Enables research on how footwear design affects leg stiffness, impact loading, and injury risk in distance runners.

resources.description: A basketball database and news platform providing NBA salary data, draft information, and team statistics. Enables economic and performance analytics research examining relationships between analytics investment and team success.

resources.description: A statistical analysis tool for reliability assessment and usefulness evaluation in sports science. Used to analyze test-retest reliability and practical utility of intermittent fitness tests in professional football.

resources.description: GitHub repository containing code for analyzing football pass reception probabilities and defensive structures using temporal graph networks. Enables quantitative analysis of offensive-defensive interactions in football match data.

resources.name: Hungarian Central Statistical Office (KSH) Regional Statistics
resources.description: Official Hungarian regional statistical dataset used to analyze core-periphery dynamics and regional disparities in handball, including gender-based patterns in player distribution and competitive success across regions.

resources.description: International Ice Hockey Federation's official data source providing historical records and statistics from Men's Ice Hockey World and Junior Championships. Used for forecasting tournament success and competitive outcomes.

resources.description: Inter-Secondary School Sports Association competition rules and regulations for track and field athletics. Used as reference for analyzing contextual factors affecting athlete development and early competitive success in secondary school athletics.

resources.description: Official IJF ranking and performance statistics database for competitive judo athletes. Provides performance metrics used in systematic reviews analyzing factors related to judo athlete success and competition outcomes.

resources.name: Israeli Women's Premier Basketball League
resources.description: Official Israeli Women's Premier Basketball League website providing match records and player data. Used to analyze relative age effects among female professional basketball players in competitive league settings.

resources.description: International Wheelchair Basketball Federation official records and match statistics database. Provides comprehensive wheelchair basketball performance data for analyzing player classifications and match outcome patterns.

resources.description: Japanese national sports performance center providing biomechanical and physiological data on athletes. Contains ground reaction force and movement analysis data used to study basketball directional change mechanics.

resources.description: GitHub repository containing code and corpus of American football broadcast transcripts for natural language processing. Enables analysis of commentator bias and narrative patterns in sports broadcasting.

resources.description: Comprehensive historical database of Indiana high school boys' basketball tournament records and results. Supports analysis of interscholastic tournament success correlations with school characteristics.

resources.description: Standardized basketball skills assessment instrument measuring dribbling proficiency. Used as baseline measurement in research on effectiveness of interactive video analysis training for skill acquisition in basketball.

resources.description: Juventus official financial reports and investor relations documents containing player transfer valuations and asset data. Used for analyzing the monetary role and asset valuation of player rights in professional football.

resources.name: Kanto College Basketball Federation Records
resources.description: Official Kanto College Basketball Federation database providing comprehensive match records and game statistics. Used to analyze causal relationships between game flow dynamics and competitive outcomes in basketball.

resources.name: Keeper rating system
resources.description: Specialized rating and evaluation system for college football quarterbacks and offensive performance. Provides advanced metrics and ratings used for predictive modeling and performance assessment in college football analytics.

resources.name: kknn

resources.name: KHL official timekeeping records
resources.description: Official Kontinental Hockey League dataset containing detailed match timing, play-by-play events, and performance records. Provides comprehensive data for analyzing workload characteristics, game intensity, and elite ice hockey training patterns.

resources.description: Comprehensive Korean baseball statistics database containing player performance metrics, game results, and advanced sabermetric data. Enables machine learning applications and comparative analysis in baseball analytics.

resources.description: Medical and injury surveillance database from the Korea Football Association tracking injury incidence across national soccer teams. Provides epidemiological data for injury risk analysis and prevention research in professional football.

resources.description: Heart rate variability (HRV) analysis software for measuring cardiovascular response and autonomic nervous system dynamics. Used in athletics research to correlate HRV with exercise intensity, recovery, and performance during prolonged running.

resources.description: Official Spanish professional basketball league (Liga Endesa) results and statistics database. Provides match results, team and player performance data for analyzing role-specific contributions in professional basketball.

resources.description: Geospatial nighttime remote sensing dataset used to examine environmental and infrastructure factors influencing outdoor jogging participation and athlete training location patterns.

resources.description: An R package for nonlinear least-squares fitting using the Levenberg-Marquardt algorithm. Applied in biomechanical analysis to estimate sprint performance profiles from timing gate data.

resources.description: A GitHub repository containing diving competition datasets and analysis code for examining judge scoring patterns and diver competency assessment in competitive diving.

resources.description: A GitHub repository providing code for efficient statistical computation of player lineup combinations in basketball using semilattice structures, enabling lineup performance analysis.

resources.description: An industry classification system used to standardize sponsorship categorization. Applied in esports research to map and analyze sponsor portfolio diversification strategies.

resources.description: A name-based demographic inference service that estimates ethnicity and gender from names. Used in baseball research to analyze racial representation and draft disparities in Major League Baseball.

resources.description: A freely available global elevation dataset from NASA's Shuttle Radar Topography Mission. Enables analysis of birthplace altitude effects on distance running performance in Olympic and world championship athletes.

resources.description: A global population health dataset with average height statistics by country and demographics. Applied to analyze relative age effects and physical development patterns in basketball populations.

resources.description: Cognitive assessment instrument from Cambridge Brain Sciences measuring pattern recognition and cognitive flexibility. Used to evaluate cognitive correlates of competitive performance in complex multi-player video games like esports titles.

resources.description: Comprehensive betting odds and historical wagering database aggregating odds from multiple bookmakers. Provides market-based probability estimates and historical match data supporting predictive modeling in cricket and other sports.

resources.description: Official national handball federation database containing league records, team registrations, and match statistics. Enables analysis of regional disparities, gender patterns, and network dynamics in Hungarian handball competition.

resources.description: GitHub repository containing a temporal action localization dataset and algorithm specifically designed for 3×3 basketball analysis. Enables detection and classification of game events in street basketball format for detailed performance evaluation.

resources.description: JavaScript mapping library for visualizing geographic and spatial data. Used in sports analytics for athlete tracking and location-based performance visualization, such as marathon participant positioning and movement analysis.

resources.description: Biomechanical simulation software for modeling human movement and musculoskeletal systems. Enables researchers to evaluate sensor alignment effects on IMU-based joint angle estimates and validate motion capture data in athletics.

resources.description: Evidence quality assessment framework defining research methodology standards from systematic reviews to expert opinion. Used to evaluate strength of evidence in sports science research synthesis and scoping reviews.

resources.description: Historical dataset of NBA player lineup combinations and utilization patterns across seasons and teams. Enables topological and network analysis of team composition strategies using persistent homology methods.

resources.description: Comprehensive football database containing team rosters, managerial records, and performance statistics across European leagues. Enables analysis of coaching changes and their effects on team performance outcomes.

resources.name: TreeSHAP
resources.description: Open-source Python library implementing SHAP (SHapley Additive exPlanations) values for tree-based model interpretation. Enables feature importance analysis and model explainability for handball match outcome prediction.

resources.name: Trinidad Alfonso EDP Valencia Marathon Results
resources.description: Official marathon event results database with participant demographics and split times. Supports analysis of pacing strategies across athlete sex, age categories, and performance levels in endurance running.

resources.name: tsai
resources.description: Python deep learning library for time series analysis and forecasting. Used in sports analytics for modeling temporal patterns in athlete health and performance monitoring data.

resources.name: U.S. Soccer Official Player Database
resources.description: Official U.S. Soccer player roster and biographical data including anthropometric measurements, match participation, and performance statistics for national team analysis.

resources.name: UBIMET GmbH Weather Data
resources.description: Commercial weather data provider offering real-time and historical environmental conditions including temperature, precipitation, and wind data for sports performance analysis.

resources.name: UCF101 Dataset
resources.description: Large-scale video dataset containing 13,320 video clips across 101 action categories, including gymnastics movements. Used for training computer vision models for movement evaluation and analysis.

resources.name: UCI Track Specifications
resources.description: Official Union Cycliste Internationale regulations and technical specifications for cycling track facilities and equipment standards used in performance analysis research.

resources.name: UEFA Club Finance and Investment Report
resources.description: Annual comprehensive financial analysis of European professional football clubs including investment data, revenue sources, and asset valuations for club economics research.

resources.name: Ultralytics YOLOv11
resources.description: Python library implementing YOLOv11 object detection model optimized for real-time detection tasks. Widely used for soccer player, ball, and field element detection in video analysis.

resources.name: un-xPass Implementation
resources.description: GitHub repository containing baseline implementations for expected pass completion probability models in soccer. Provides code for evaluating pass reception chances against defensive structures.

resources.name: USA Diving Official Results
resources.description: Official database of diving competition results including athlete scores, judge evaluations, and performance metrics from USA Diving sanctioned events at all levels.

resources.name: USportsHoops
resources.description: Canadian university basketball statistics and results database covering player performance metrics, team records, and game outcomes for NCAA/Canadian college basketball analysis.

resources.name: NBA Injury Demographics Analysis
resources.description: GitHub repository with code for analyzing NBA player injury data with demographic variables including position, age, and injury type to assess performance impact.

resources.name: Wanda Diamond League Results
resources.description: Official Diamond League track and field competition results database including athlete performances, times, distances, and rankings across elite international athletics events.

resources.name: Wattbike Pro Ergometer
resources.description: Advanced cycling power meter and ergometer instrument measuring pedal force, cadence, power output, and movement patterns. Used for biomechanical analysis and performance assessment in cycling research.

resources.name: Weather Underground
resources.description: Weather data aggregation platform providing historical and real-time environmental conditions including temperature, humidity, and precipitation for sports venue analysis.

resources.name: Whippr
resources.description: Python package for analyzing oxygen uptake kinetics and respiratory physiology data from cardiopulmonary exercise testing. Used for assessing aerobic capacity in combat sports athletes.

resources.name: WIN Magazine TPI Rankings
resources.description: Tournament Power Index rankings dataset for collegiate wrestling compiled by Wrestling Insider Magazine. Provides historical tournament performance data enabling predictive modeling and ranking analysis of wrestling programs and athletes.

resources.name: Wingate Anaerobic Test Protocol
resources.description: Standardized testing protocol for measuring anaerobic power output and fatigue characteristics in cycling. Provides methodology for assessing sprint cycling performance and recovery, enabling comparative physiological analysis.

resources.name: WINSTEPS
resources.description: Rasch measurement software for analyzing rating scales and latent trait modeling. Applied to sports psychology assessment, enabling validation of constructs like 'creactability' in football performance evaluation.

resources.name: Witty Gate Timing Gates
resources.description: Electronic timing gate system for measuring sprint running velocity and acceleration in athletics. Provides precise temporal data for analyzing sprint performance and training adaptations in track and field.

resources.name: WNBA Historical Box Score Data
resources.description: Historical box score statistics from Women's National Basketball Association games. Contains detailed match-level performance data enabling analysis of crowd effects, home court advantage, and temporal trends in women's basketball.

resources.name: WNBA Salary Cap and Wage Data
resources.description: Comprehensive dataset of WNBA salary structures, minimum wages, and collective bargaining agreement terms. Enables economic analysis of gender wage gaps and compensation models in professional women's basketball.

resources.name: WNBA.com Official Data
resources.description: Official Women's National Basketball Association website providing current season statistics, rosters, schedules, and performance data. Primary data source for contemporary WNBA analysis and economic research.

resources.name: WCBA Official Website
resources.description: Women's Chinese Basketball Association official website providing match results, team statistics, and player performance data. Enables analysis of team success factors and competitive dynamics in professional Chinese women's basketball.

resources.name: Women's World Record 1500m Data
resources.description: Historical dataset of women's 1500-meter world record performances and split times. Enables analysis of pacing strategies, cognitive regulation of exercise intensity, and performance optimization in middle-distance track racing.

resources.name: Woodway DESMO Pro XL Treadmill
resources.description: High-precision instrumented treadmill system for measuring biomechanical and physiological parameters during running. Enables collection of heart rate variability and exercise prescription data for prolonged running studies.

resources.name: World Bank Economic Data
resources.description: World Bank development indicators including GNP per capita and country classification data. Used in sports analytics to contextualize Paralympic participation, athlete demographics, and international fairness in competitive sport.

resources.name: World Football Elo Ratings
resources.description: Historical Elo ratings dataset for international football teams with ratings updated after each match. Provides predictive features for machine learning models forecasting soccer match results and team performance.

resources.name: Fairness in FPS Games Matchmaking Solution
resources.description: GitHub code repository implementing skill-based matchmaking algorithms for team-based first-person shooter esports. Demonstrates machine learning approaches for fair player assignment and competitive balance in esports environments.

resources.name: Wyscout Open Access Dataset
resources.description: Open-source collection of soccer event data from Wyscout platform including match events, player actions, and spatiotemporal tracking. Enables research in soccer analytics, agent behavior analysis, and player performance evaluation.

resources.name: Xsens Inertial Measurement Units
resources.description: Wearable inertial measurement unit system for capturing body motion data. Applied to ice hockey to measure skating kinematics, temporal-spatial parameters, and biomechanical performance analysis.

resources.name: YOLOv8n
resources.description: A lightweight real-time object detection model from the YOLOv8 family, optimized for detecting players, balls, and other objects in football video footage. Enables efficient multi-object tracking and player identification for sports analytics applications.

resources.name: Web of Science
resources.description: Academic citation database and research discovery platform indexing peer-reviewed publications across sports science, physiology, and analytics. Essential for systematic reviews and literature analysis in sports research.

resources.name: IBM SPSS Statistics
resources.description: Statistical analysis software for quantitative research, commonly used in sports science for analyzing physiological measurements, performance data, and experimental designs in athletic performance studies.

resources.name: Altman Z-Score
resources.description: Financial distress prediction model from 1968 that combines multiple financial ratios to assess bankruptcy risk. Used in sports analytics to evaluate financial health and sustainability of football clubs.

resources.name: ESG Score (GSBS Report 2022)
resources.description: Environmental, Social, and Governance performance metrics dataset measuring sustainability and corporate responsibility practices in European football clubs, enabling analysis of ESG impact on organizational performance.

resources.name: ERA5 Reanalysis Data
resources.description: Comprehensive climate and weather reanalysis dataset from Copernicus providing historical and real-time meteorological data. Enables analysis of extreme weather impacts on sports scheduling and athlete performance across football and other outdoor sports.

resources.name: European Betting Odds Dataset
resources.description: Custom dataset of pre-match decimal betting odds from major European bookmakers, structured for probability modeling. Enables domain-driven approaches to predicting match outcomes in football.

resources.name: RPI Ratings Database
resources.description: NCAA basketball ratings and rankings database tracking Ratings Percentage Index (RPI) metrics. Provides historical data for analyzing home court advantage effects and team strength assessment in college basketball.

resources.name: High-Altitude Training Camp Iten
resources.description: Elite training facility in Kenya at 2400m altitude offering athlete performance data and research opportunities. Primary source for studying adaptation to high-altitude conditions and extreme climatic impacts on distance running athletes.

resources.name: Conmebol U-20 Championship Records
resources.description: Match and player data from South American youth football championships. Dataset for analyzing relative age effects, talent development patterns, and competitive dynamics in youth football talent identification.

resources.name: Opta Sports Data (FotMob)
resources.description: Event-level match statistics from Opta/Stats-Perform accessed via FotMob platform, including shot data, passing, and positioning information. Enables advanced metrics development such as expected goals on target for elite football performance analysis.

resources.name: buildmer
resources.description: R package for automated mixed-effects model building and variable selection. Facilitates statistical analysis of movement and physiological data in sports science research, particularly for analyzing inertial measurement unit-derived gait parameters.

resources.name: Friends of Tracking Last Row
resources.description: GitHub repository with publicly available football tracking data and helper tools. Provides foundational datasets and utilities for developing and testing pitch control, possession, and spatial analysis models in soccer.

resources.name: Laurie Shaw Pitch Control
resources.description: Python implementation of the Spearman pitch control model from Friends of Tracking. Reference implementation for spatial control analysis in football, enabling quantification of team territorial dominance and ball influence.

resources.name: Will Thomson Pitch Control
resources.description: Python implementation of the Fernandez pitch control model for football spatial analysis. Provides alternative methodology for modeling pitch ownership and territorial control in soccer using tracking data.

resources.name: KNN Pitch Control
resources.description: Python GitHub repository implementing k-nearest neighbors approach to pitch control modeling in football. Enables neighbor-based spatial analysis for measuring team possession influence and territorial control on the pitch.

resources.name: Footballia
resources.description: Video archive and database of football match recordings with detailed game footage. Provides access to historical and contemporary football matches, enabling researchers to conduct observational analysis of game situations, tactical patterns, and player performance.

resources.name: HeatStress
resources.description: R package for calculating and analyzing heat stress indices and thermal risk metrics. Enables football researchers to assess extreme heat conditions and their implications for match scheduling, player safety, and performance in various climate conditions.

resources.name: CRPDP - Coordination Analysis
resources.description: GitHub repository containing code for analyzing interlimb coordination during soccer kicking movements. Provides computational methods for processing biomechanical data to compare coordination patterns between elite and amateur football players.

resources.name: Bongda.com.vn
resources.description: Vietnamese football data platform providing information on clubs, players, matches, and league standings. Serves as a primary data source for analyzing digital transformation adoption and operational metrics within Vietnamese football organizations.

resources.name: Transfermarkt
resources.description: Comprehensive football transfer and financial database tracking player transfers, market values, contract information, and club expenditures. Essential resource for analyzing transfer policies, financial governance, and spending patterns across European football clubs.
